intro: Hebenstretia aurea, commonly known as the golden hebenstretia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant has lance-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. It thrives in well-drained soils and prefers full sun to partial shade. Hebenstretia aurea is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
